Subjects: Christ, love of; Christ, love to sinners; aphorisms
_description: On the lasting love of Christ — one couplet

NYPL146.Transcription: Þe loue of ihesu lastythWan al þe world passyth
NYPL146.Note:
Added to top margin of flyleaf by a fifteenth-century hand; signed or
                    attributed to ‘Catesby’.
